text.title:
Puzzle & Dragon Network
ver. 2015.02.11
text.intro: This network demonstrates the interplays between characters essential for completing advanced dungeons with 0-1 stone (collected from skyozora team build repository). 'Advanced dungeons' denotes all descends, rushes, challenges 6-10 and advanced materials.

legend.edgeLabel: A team relationship between two characters
legend.colorLabel: Color represents an automatic clustering of characters based on the connectivity
